name: DrMichaelWesleySermons
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: michael wesley sermons
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Mission of the Greater Shiloh Missionary Baptist Church is to Reach, Teach, and Baptize throughout the world beginning in our community, fulfilling the Great Commission by the power and presence of the Holy Spirit until Jesus returns. 

Once enabled, you can listen to the most recent episode by saying, "Alexa, play Michael Wesley Sermons."

To pause or resume any episode, say "Alexa, pause" or "Alexa, resume." To listen to previous episodes, say "Alexa, play the previous episode." If you want to know the title of an episode while the episode is playing, say "Alexa, ask Michael Wesley Sermons for the title of this episode." If you want to know the air date of an episode, say "Alexa, ask Michael Wesley Sermons for the date of this episode."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
